content: 2 pm k 11 10 11 11 12 12 12 right sleeve pm k 2 pm k 25 27 27 28 29 30 32 front pm k 2 pm k 11 10 11 11 12 12 12 left sleeve pm k 2 pm k to bor neck shaping the neck is shaped by using gsr the raglan increases are worked at the same  row 1 rs *k to next marker m1r rs sm k 2 sm m1l rs * repeat from * to * one more time k 3 2 2 3 3 2 3 make the gsr turn in the last knit stitch  row 2 ws p to bor sm when you pass them *p to marker m1r ws sm p 2 sm m1l ws * repeat from * to * one more time p 3 2 2 3 3 2 3 make the gsr turn in the last purled stitch  row 3 rs k to bor sm when you pass them *k to next marker m1r rs sm k2 sm m1l rs * repeat from * to * one more time k to last gsr turn k gsr turn as one stitch k 2 3 3 3 3 4 4 make the gsr turn in the last knit stitch  row 4 ws p to bor sm when you pass them *p to marker m1r ws sm p 2 sm m1l ws * repeat from * to * one more time p to last gsr turn p gsr turn as one stitch p 2 3 3 3 3 4 4 make the gsr turn in the last purled stitch repeat row 3 and 4 two more time you turned a total of 4 times on each side  row 9 rs k to bor there are 112 114 116 118 122 124 128 sts on the needles raglan increases continue working in the round while increasing every other round as follows  round 1 increase round *k to next marker m1r rs sm k 2 sm m1l rs * repeat from * to * three more times k to bor  round 2 k all sts slip markers when you pass them work round 1 and 2 a total of 16 17 18 19 21 22 23 times now there are a total of 240 250 260 270 290 300 312 sts on the needles 65 69 71 74 79 82 86 sts for the front same for the back 51 52 55 57 62 64 66 sts for each sleeve and 8 raglan sts now the work measures 25 7 26 5 27 3 28 2 29 8 30 7 31 5 cm from the cast-on edge at the back 3 separation of body and sleeves k to next marker slip or remove marker k 1 place next 53 54 57 59 64 66 68 sts on hold cast on 4 4 6 7 7 9 11 sts k 1 slip or remove marker
